page.title: 08Our Faith
page.content: I go to a Church of England Primary school.This means I am a{Christian.} Being a Christian means{believing in } {God.} The Vicar comes in on Thursday mornings and preaches about God and how Jesus did things.He teaches through the Catechism about the Christian Faith.We learn the{Apostles} {Creed,Lord's Prayer and the Grace.} We visit our church on special occasions like{St.Swithun's {Day,Ascension Day,Harvest Festival}and for end of term services.We visit to learn about the stained glass windows and other things like the Font.We use the church as a{learning resource.} { We assemble every day to worship,each teacher takes a turn to lead the assembly.We sing and say prayers and get involved by{asking questions}and answering them.
